job_tasks.phrase: To ensure that our data remains secure, you will join our Security team, working closely with our engineering teams to secure our applications, systems, devices, and environments.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the core objective of the role within the business context of ensuring data security and collaborating with engineering teams to achieve this.

job_tasks.phrase: Create visibility by onboarding new events into our SIEM
job_tasks.justification: Onboarding events into a SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) system is a data engineering task related to data collection and preparation for analysis and security monitoring.

job_tasks.phrase: Recognize threats and triage upcoming vulnerabilities
job_tasks.justification: While not traditional ML modeling, recognizing threats and triaging vulnerabilities involves analytical processes and potentially pattern recognition, which is a form of intelligence application.

job_tasks.phrase: Help building solutions to improve the security of our infrastructure, network, and services
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to developing software solutions to enhance security, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate security processes in the development life-cycle
job_tasks.justification: Automating security processes within the development lifecycle involves building and integrating security tools and scripts, which is a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate security processes in the development life-cycle
job_tasks.justification: Automating processes within a development lifecycle, particularly for security, directly aligns with operational aspects of ensuring continuous security integration and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Create visibility by onboarding new events into our SIEM
job_tasks.justification: Onboarding events into a SIEM is part of operationalizing security monitoring and management, ensuring that security events are processed and visible in a production system.

soft_skills.phrase: working closely with our engineering teams
advise other teams with security-related questions
experienced, supportive, and collaborative IT Security team
leading with empathy makes us better together
Have an open eye for security improvements
Recognize threats and triage upcoming vulnerabilities
Help building solutions to improve the security of our infrastructure, network, and services
Depending on your focus area, you will
Automate security processes in the development life-cycle
Create visibility by onboarding new events into our SIEM

classification.rationale: This job description focuses on IT Security, not AI engineering. The tasks involve securing applications, identifying vulnerabilities, and automating security processes, which are core IT security functions. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, or related technologies that define a GenAI Engineer.
